messages.title: SAVE OUR NHS
messages.content: OUR NHS NEEDS YOU. WE HAVE 48 HOURS TO SAVE OUR NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 100,000 nurses, guarantee GP appointments within 48 hours, cancer tests and results within one week

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: THE TORIES ARE A THREAT TO OUR NHS

issues.health: Staying at home or voting for any other party will let the Tories win.

images.caption: Leaflet page with Labour party pledges to hire more nurses and improve NHS service times alongside a critical message about the Tory party.
